rukus.text: 26|53|Pas Fir'avn [cun az mocaro ogoh gardid] ma'muroni cam'ovari [neru]-ro ʙa sahrho firistod
26|54|[Va e'lon kard] Inho [Bani Isroil] iddai nocizand
26|57|Pas, ononro az ʙoƣho va casmaho [-i sarzamini Misr] ʙerun ovardem
26|58|Va az gancho va xonahoi mucallal [dur soxtem]
26|59|Incunin [kardem] va Bani Isroilro vorisi on [sarvatu doroi] kardem
26|60|Pas, [sipohi Fir'avn] hangomi tului oftoʙ ʙa ta'qiʙi onon pardoxtand
26|61|Va cun du guruh jakdigarro didand, joroni Muso guftand: «Hatman, [dar cangoli fir'avnijon] giriftorem»
26|62|[Muso] Guft: «Hargiz! Be tardid, Parvardigoram ʙo man ast va maro [ʙa rohi nacot] hidojat xohad kard»
26|63|Pas, ʙa Muso vahj kardem: «Asojatro ʙa darjo ʙizan», pas, [Nil] sikofta sud va har ʙaxse [az on] hamcun kuhe ʙuzurg gast
26|64|Va on guruhi digar [sipohi Fir'avn]-ro ʙa on co kasondem
26|65|Va Muso va hamai kasonero, ki hamrohas ʙudand, nacot dodem
26|67|Hatman, dar in [mocaro] nisonae [ʙaroi iʙrat giriftan] ast, vale ʙestarason mu'min naʙudand
26|68|Va ʙe tardid, Parvardigorat hamon sikastnopaziri mehruʙon ast
26|69|[Ej pajomʙar] Dostoni Iʙrohimro ʙar onon ʙozgu
